name: Synergy (itch)
description: 20XX year. The routine of a professional robber was interrupted by an unexpected offer. Some Anonymous offered to pay generously for breaking into a guarded military base and stealing any secret technology that is hidden there. Sounds like a life's work! A high-frequency sword, a revolver with armour-piercing bullets and a hot head - the whole kit for breaking and entering was ready. And so this story began...
